FAQs

  • What is your Refer-a-Friend program?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • How much can I earn? How do I get rewarded for referring my friends?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • How do I get my personal Referral Code?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • How do I share my Referral Code?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • How does my friend enroll with Georgia Natural Gas?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • How will I know if someone signs up with my Referral Code?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • When will I receive my Refer-a-Friend rewards?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • How do I check the status of my Refer-a-Friend rewards?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • If I refer my friends what do they get?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • What is the difference between a Referral Code and a promo code?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • I sent my friend an email from your online email tool but my friend never received the email. What could have happened?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.

  • If I was referred by a friend, but forgot to provide their Referral Code, what should I do?

    The Georgia Natural Gas Refer-a-Friend program allows current GNG customers to earn credits on their bill when they refer their friends who enroll with GNG.
